No Poverty.reason: No evidence found in the course description regarding poverty, economic disparity, or social welfare.

Good Health and Well-being.reason: The course includes a reading on "religious healing" (宗教療癒), which tangentially relates to well-being from a specific cultural and religious perspective.
evidence: 盧蕙馨、鄺真泉,〈宗教療癒的「情入」與「理入」,《輔仁宗教研究》32(2016):71-100。

Quality Education.reason: The course is a doctoral-level seminar focused on developing advanced academic skills, such as writing a substantial academic paper and engaging in critical discussions.
evidence: 本課程係屬「研討課程」(seminar)
期末論文為學術型論文,約8,000-12,000字
開課單位：宗教博一、宗教博二 Course Department:Religious Studies/D/1&2

Gender Equality.reason: The course dedicates a specific section to "Gender Studies" as a new field in religious studies, with readings on gender ethics and women's experiences in religion.
evidence: 宗教研究的新領域 :性別研究(一)
Darlene M. Juschka, "Gender," in RC, ch. 12, pp. 229-242.
李玉珍,〈寺院廚房的姊妹情:戰後台灣佛教婦女的性別意識與修行>
